function.name: cookingTemperature_getValue
function.description: This function is used to retrieve the current temperature of a specified compartment in a cooking appliance.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to get the temperature.

groupAction.description: A group action identifier if applicable.

predefinedCompartment.description: The specific compartment within the device to get the temperature.
